data.text: Draghi: A cross-check of the economic analysis with the monetary analysis confirms the need to maintain a steady monetary policy course
Draghi: Staff projections are conditional on the full implementation of all our monetary policy measures
Draghi: Inflation projected to be at 0.3% in '15, 1.5% in '16 and 1.8% in '17 (March: 0%, 1.5%, 1.8%)
Draghi: The risks surrounding the economic outlook remain on downside but have become more balanced
Draghi: Annual real GDP projected to increase by 1.5% in '15, 1.9% in '16 and 2.0% in '17 (March: 1.5%, 1,9%, 2,1%)
Draghi: Full implementation of all monetary policy measures will lead to sustained return of inflation rates towards 2%
Draghi: Monetary policy has contributed to recovery in inflation expectations, better borrowing conditions
Draghi: Governing Council concentrates on trends in inflation, looking through fluctuations if judged to be transient
Draghi: The asset purchase programmes are proceeding well
